TopicTitle: Stockalike or realistic Virgin Galactic Space Ship 2 and mothership mod request.

Articles.Content: I think it would be really cool if someone where to make a realistic or stockalike Space Ship 2 mod with the mothership and IVA (possible with FreeIVA). Maybe even add a RO/RSS config? Also maybe not like all 1 main part and have like wings separate parts ect..
Could someone please maybe try and do this?
